text: Today in The Briefing: "The ABC altered a story on Australia’s Covid-19 contact tracing app following a written complaint from the office of Prime Minister Scott Morrison, which criticised 'unnecessarily alarmist' coverage of privacy concerns." https://t.co/rXhJ6eISdh
